group_1.textLeft: I...came here to receive Sakuya's memento...!

group_1.textRight: Sakuya's...

group_1.textLeft: And, to be honest, it's why I came here yesterday@too...
I thought I shouldn't get it,
but I want to grant Sakuya's request...

group_1.textRight: A memento – does that mean Sakuya left something@for you when she was alive?

group_1.textLeft: She told me she wanted me to have a certificate of@honor...
...from Yuna's home as a memento...

group_1.textRight: But, why'd she leave it for you...
...and not Yuna...?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't ask her, but...
"I'm too embarrassed to entrust it to Yuna and@Hikaru" is what she said...

group_1.textRight: Hmph...
She just didn't want to show her regretful side.

group_1.textLeft: Sounds like her, though.
Um...what about you, Yuna?
Were you given certificates of honor from Sakuya...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...I have some, so let me go bring them...
Sorry for the wait... They're inside this box.

group_1.textLeft: Ah – so many tubes...!

group_1.textRight: Every one of them is important,
so every time I received one I would keep it safe@in a tube...

group_1.textLeft: Even though they're so dear to you, may I still have@one...?

group_1.textRight: I believe Sakuya would be overjoyed,
not only for you to receive a certificate of honor,
but that she has been remembered, and continued@to be thought of...

group_1.textCenter: Well...I guess it doesn't matter if you do get it or not,
it's just, even if it's only one person, I want someone@to remember me.

group_1.textLeft: (Maybe Yuna understood Sakuya more than anyone@else...)
...I won't ever forget Sakuya.

group_1.textRight: Thank you...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh – Ranka...?!

group_1.textRight: I was wondering what kinda certificates you had@in here.

group_1.textLeft: You can't just open it as you please!

group_1.textRight: Who cares.
This is my way of remembering her. I'm gonna.
There's no point in keeping a certificate like this@all safe as a memento.
Ranka has a point.
Since she's gone through the trouble,@you have a look too, Urara.

group_1.textLeft: ...Then...

group_1.narration: Futatsugi City Track Tournament@Junior High School Girl's 100m@Championship　Sakuya Suzuka

group_1.textLeft: Championship...?! That's amazing, Sakuya...!

group_1.textRight: That is...the certificate from her championship@in her first year of junior high...
It seemed awkward for her to beat her senpais@she admired so much,
but they seemed more than happy that she won@the championship...
Such an opportunity allowed her to become@the kind of senpai she wanted to be...

group_1.textLeft: Then Sakuya would have been a wonderful senpai.
(I, the whole track team, everyone – we would've@all admired you...)

group_1.textRight: Hm...ain't there still somethin' in the tube there?

group_1.textLeft: Ah! There's a letter inside!
Let's see...@[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]"To Urara"...

group_1.textRight: A letter from Sakuya!
